name: SURVIVAL PAINT TOWN RED
description:
SURVIVAL PAINT TOWN RED is a game where your only task is to survive! Pick up a weapon and start the battle! Notice that all the weapons has different varying strength! Run away and search for the best tactic to defeat all your enemies! Find a point where you can attack more easily! Play in single or multiplayer mode! Survive the hostile city!

Features:

⁃Single player mode
⁃High variations of weapons
⁃Urban environment
⁃Multiplayer mode
